title: Possible options for buying RP
body: I no longer can buy RP points due to having blank pages popping up and a loading screen that does not even progress. There should be a way to purchase RP through the website other than having to face errors when purchasing through client. Not sure if this has been brought up a long time ago.

replies.body:
Let's just resolve the issues you're having with using the store right now so you don't have to find another way to purchase RP! :)

Most store issues are caused by either security settings that prevent you from reaching the store pages or certain browser settings that League relies on being configured incorrectly. I'd recommend going through our [**Store Issues Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660) for some common solutions that may resolve this for you.

Let me know if this helped!
